name: My Pet School 3D
description:
Enjoy a colorful, three-dimensional world with lots of entertaining tasks and minigames.

  • Educate cute animals like dogs, cats, horses, rabbits and parakeets
  • Show them amazing tricks like turn around, play dead, sit up and beg, lay down and give paw
  • Reward your pets with tidbits
  • Care lovingly for them and keep an eye on their values
  • Provide special training in obedience, road safety, family life, guiding or let them become big movie stars
  • Enjoy the wide area with city, sea and meadows to train or to ride out
  • Choose between a great selection of different objects to work with
  • Exchange Play Coins for ingame currency
  • Expand your pet school and your knowledge about animals
